entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story who has a feeling of being watched by unseen eyes.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: A person who is angry and demanding, pushing Harry in front of her like a shield.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A person who is triumphant and smiling, shouting that they are not far from their destination.

relationships.description: Umbridge pushes Harry in front of her like a shield to protect herself.
Hermione is standing next to Harry, wearing a triumphant smile.
